name: Dreamer Series: Teacher
summary: Dreamer: Teacher is the perfect choice for everyone who always wanted to know what its like to be at the head of the class. Have fun teaching your pupils how to play an instrument and how to dance. Even show them how fun art class can be! Make sure they learn about the right behaviour in the schools cafeteria, when they start throwing food. Comfort them if they hurt themselves in the playground and take care of their clothing. After schools over, join your students in the playground to jump rope and play hopscotch!
